LR-splitpipe

Demultiplexing single-cell long-read data from LR-Split-seq

LR-splitpipe is a demultiplexer I wrote for our LR-Split-seq assay, which combines Parse Bioscience’s combinatorial barcoding strategy with long-read sequencing to produce full-length transcriptomes of single cells.
